content: In the end, I used all that treasure to buy all sorts of car parts and Soda Pop-Pops! Swoosh~! Wanna try one?
info: 参观新家后-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本

content: But all those shiny gems and jewels are useless to me, so... I sold them all to Glenn.
info: 参观新家后-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本

content: {A想象}Have you ever experienced the rush of discovering hidden treasure? When you've overcome danger, crossed mountains and seas, and finally lay your eyes on your prize at the end... A shiny, glowing treasure chest!
info: 参观新家后-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本

content: {A点头}Glenn might be small in stature, but he takes his shop very seriously and is very attentive to everyone's needs. He even stocks up on different designs for trivial things like cushions.
info: 参观新家后-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本

content: I do like to tease him, but I actually really respect how hard he works and how detail-oriented he is!
info: 参观新家后-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本

content: {A发抖}When I was out adventuring this one time, I encountered a kind of flying fish that leaped right out of the water and into the air, and slapped me across the face with its tail. It made catching it a lot easier, but boy did my face hurt... ughhh...
info: 参观新家后-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本

content: Still, fishing is just wild! Even... even though some rare fish turn out to be super tiny...
info: 参观新家后-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本
